page.title: ServerlessDays Cardiff - Workshops
page.description: Enhance your Serverless Knowledge by attending a workshop from one of our partners.

workshops.title: Remote debugging of live AWS Lambda functions
workshops.description: Learn how to use open source technology to add remote debugging to your favorite IDE for AWS Lambda.
workshops.location: Tramshed Tech, Unit D, Pendyris St, Cardiff CF11 6BH

workshops.title: Serverless Web Application Workshop
workshops.description: In this workshop you'll deploy a simple web application that enables users to request unicorn rides from the Wild Rydes fleet.
workshops.location: DevOps Group, Floor 22, Capital Tower, Greyfriars Rd, Cardiff CF10 3AG

workshops.title: Serverless Monitoring and Troubleshooting with Lumigo
workshops.description: In this workshop you will learn how to troubleshoot issues in your serverless applications.
workshops.location: Tramshed Tech, Unit D, Pendyris St, Cardiff CF11 6BH

workshops.title: Serverless Security Workshop
workshops.description: In this workshop we'll deploy a simple Serverless application to Microsoft Azure, but there's a problem, it has a few security gaps that need addressing. That's our job to fix.
workshops.location: Tramshed Tech, Unit D, Pendyris St, Cardiff CF11 6BH
